verses.verse: A <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8081>ointment,<s%> And the <S%H3117>day<s%> of [one's] <S%H4194>death<s%> is better <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of one's <S%H3205>birth.<s%>

It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> to a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H60>mourning<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> to a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4960>feasting,<s%> <S%H834>Because<s%> that is the <S%H5490>end<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> And the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5414>takes<s%> [it] to <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H3708>Sorrow<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H7814>laughter,<s%> For when a <S%H6440>face<s%> is <S%H7455>sad<s%> a <S%H3820>heart<s%> may be <S%H3190>happy.<s%>

The <S%H3820>mind<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H60>mourning,<s%> While the <S%H3820>mind<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8057>pleasure.<s%>

It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> for <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H7892>song<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>

For as the <S%H6963>crackling<s%> of <S%H9359>thorn<s%> <S%H9359>bushes<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> a <S%H5518>pot,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> is the <S%H7814>laughter<s%> of the <S%H3684>fool,<s%> And <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1571>too<s%> is <S%H1892>futility.<s%>
For <S%H6233>oppression<s%> <S%H1984>makes<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man<s%> <S%H1984>mad,<s%> And a <S%H4979>bribe<s%> corrupts the <S%H6>heart.<s%>

The <S%H319>end<s%> of a <S%H1697>matter<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> its <S%H7225>beginning;<s%> <S%H750>Patience<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H1364>haughtiness<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
Do not be <S%H926>eager<s%> in your <S%H7307>heart<s%> to be <S%H3707>angry,<s%> For <S%H3708>anger<s%> <S%H5117>resides<s%> in the <S%H2436>bosom<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>

Do not <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> is it that the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> were <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H428>these<s%>?" For it is not from <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> that you <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> <S%H2088>this.<s%>
<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> <S%H5973>along<s%> with an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> And an <S%H3148>advantage<s%> to those who <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

For <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H6738>protection<s%> [just as] <S%H3701>money<s%> is <S%H6738>protection.<s%> But the <S%H3504>advantage<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> is that <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H2421>preserves<s%> the <S%H2421>lives<s%> of its <S%H1167>possessors.<s%>
<S%H7200>Consider<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> For <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H8626>straighten<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> He has <S%H5791>bent<s%>?

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H9186>prosperity<s%> be <S%H9185>happy,<s%> But in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H9567>adversity<s%> <S%H7200>consider<s%> â€“ <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H2088>one<s%> as <S%H5980>well<s%> as the <S%H2088>other<s%> <S%H5921>So<s%> <S%H1700><s%> that <S%H120>man<s%> may not <S%H4672>discover<s%> <S%H3972>anything<s%> [that will be] <S%H310>after<s%> him.

I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>everything<s%> during my <S%H3117>lifetime<s%> of <S%H1892>futility;<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> is a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%> who perishes in his <S%H6>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H6664>there<s%> is a <S%H3426>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> who <S%H7563>prolongs<s%> [his life] in his <S%H748>wickedness.<s%>
Do not be <S%H7235>excessively<s%> <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and do not be <S%H3148>overly<s%> <S%H2449>wise.<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> should you <S%H8074>ruin<s%> yourself?
Do not be <S%H7235>excessively<s%> <S%H7561>wicked,<s%> and do not be a <S%H5530>fool.<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> should you <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H3808>before<s%> your <S%H6256>time<s%>?

It is <S%H2896>good<s%> that you <S%H270>grasp<s%> <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H2088>thing,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> not <S%H5117>let<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H5117>go<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H2088>other;<s%> for the one who <S%H3372>fears<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3318>comes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> with <S%H3605>both<s%> of them.
<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> <S%H5810>strengthens<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H7989>rulers<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in a <S%H5892>city.<s%>

<S%H3588>Indeed,<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is not a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> on <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [continually] <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H9185>good<s%> and who <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H2398>sins.<s%>

<S%H1571>Also,<s%> do not <S%H5414>take<s%> <S%H3820>seriously<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> you <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7043>cursing<s%> you.
For you <S%H1571>also<s%> have <S%H3045>realized<s%> that you <S%H1571>likewise<s%> have <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H312>others.<s%>
I <S%H5254>tested<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2090>this<s%> with <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> [and] I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will be <S%H2449>wise,<s%>" but it was <S%H7350>far<s%> from me.
<S%H4100>What<s%> has <S%H1961>been<s%> is <S%H7350>remote<s%> and <S%H6013>exceedingly<s%> <S%H6013>mysterious.<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> can <S%H4672>discover<s%> it?

I <S%H5437>directed<s%> my <S%H3820>mind<s%> to <S%H3045>know,<s%> to <S%H8446>investigate,<s%> and to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and an <S%H2808>explanation,<s%> and to <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H7562>evil<s%> of <S%H3689>folly<s%> and the <S%H3689>foolishness<s%> of <S%H1947>madness.<s%>

And I <S%H4672>discovered<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H4194>death<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H9285>snares<s%> and <S%H2764>nets,<s%> whose <S%H3027>hands<s%> are <S%H612>chains.<s%> <S%H2896>One<s%> <S%H2896>who<s%> is <S%H2896>pleasing<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H4422>escape<s%> from her, but the <S%H2398>sinner<s%> will be <S%H3920>captured<s%> by her.

<S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H4672>discovered<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H6953>Preacher,<s%> "[adding] <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H259>thing<s%> to <S%H259>another<s%> to <S%H4672>find<s%> an <S%H2808>explanation,<s%>

<S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H1245>seeking<s%> but have not <S%H4672>found.<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> but I have not <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these.<s%>

<S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H905>only<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H3477>upright,<s%> but they have <S%H1245>sought<s%> out <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H2810>devices.<s%>"
